wordSelection.title: Word Selection
wordSelection.description: Long press on an English word to select it and add it to your vocabulary.

bookSearch.title: Look Up Post
bookSearch.description: Tap the book icon (BookSearch) below a post to select the entire post for translation or looking up meanings.

share.title: Share Feature
share.description: After selecting a word, tap the 'Share' button in the popup to share the post to Bluesky with an image. Share your learning progress with friends.

quiz.title: Practice with Quiz
quiz.description: Tap the quiz icon in the top-right of the word list screen to take a quiz using your saved vocabulary. Choose from English→Japanese, Japanese→English, or mixed mode.

textToSpeech.title: Text to Speech
textToSpeech.description: Tap the speaker icon in the word popup to hear the word or example sentence read aloud. Great for checking pronunciation.

autoSpeech.title: Auto Speech Setting
autoSpeech.description: Turn on 'Auto Speech' in Settings to automatically read words aloud when a word popup opens or when a quiz question appears.

wordSearch.title: Search Vocabulary
wordSearch.description: Use the search bar at the top of the word list screen to quickly find saved words. Supports searching by English word, Japanese meaning, or definition.

replyRepost.title: Reply & Repost
replyRepost.description: Use the icons below a post to reply or repost. With quote repost, you can add your own comment when resharing.

proofreading.title: Japanese Proofreading
proofreading.description: Tap the spell check icon in the post creation screen to detect errors in Japanese text and get correction suggestions.

customFeed.title: Custom Feeds
customFeed.description: Add Bluesky custom feeds as tabs on the home screen. Go to Settings → Feed Management to add your favorite feeds.
